{{velocity}} #set ($xaction = "$!request.xaction") {{info}} This page allows to copy a field value of all instances of given class to another field from the same class in a set of wikis of the farm. {{/info}} #if ($xaction == '') {{html}}
Example: Blog.BlogPostClass
Source property of the above class to be copied from. Example: attachedImage
Target property of the above class to be copied to. Example: image
List of wikis where this update should occur, separated by a comma. Example: xwiki,subwiki1,subwiki2
